title: New Resident Evil Teased - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.29.19
description:
Tim and Andy talk about the new Resident Evil, Shovel Knight, Dark Pictures Anthology, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:03:20 - Housekeeping
PAX is THIS week! Guild Wars event Friday morning at 9 a.m., KFGShowcase Friday at 4:30 p.m., Inter-Site Championship Saturday at 9 p.m.! Everything will be on twitch.tv/kindafunngames; event info is at kindafunny.com/events
New Party Mode today! Mario Maker! YouTube.com/kindafunnygames.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:25 - New RE To Be Revealed At TGS
00:11:50 - Yakuza 7 will be a turn-based RPG
00:16:46 - Shovel Knight Dig Announced, New Shovel Knight: Treasure Trove Details
00:23:00 - Man of Medan Sequel, Little Hope, Teased For 2020
00:26:28 - Pokemon Masters Out Today
00:31:07 - Out today

00:38:53 -  Upstart
00:40:33 - Reader mail
00:57:25 - Squad Up: Maow45 - PSN
00:58:07 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim and Andy
